item.title: Metaverse — Regione Lombardia
item.description:
Overview

Metaverse — Regione Lombardia is an accessible, city-scale metaverse prototype designed to host cultural exhibitions, live events, and civic services. The project focuses on performance, progressive enhancement for WebGL, and accessible interaction patterns.

My Role

  • Technical direction and architecture
  • Networked scenes and streaming
  • Accessibility and UX for public audiences

Key Features

  • Lightweight streaming and scene LOD
  • Multi-user events and moderation tools
  • Integration with regional content and services
